title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document user stories, functional requirements, non-functional requirements, and success criteria for the MusicTherapyAssistant.

title: Design Music Therapy AI Algorithm
description: Develop a design for the AI component that selects and generates music based on user's emotional and physical health issues.

title: Design User Interface for MusicTherapyAssistant
description: Create a wireframe and visual design for the frontend of the MusicTherapyAssistant, focusing on usability and accessibility.

title: Develop Backend for Music Therapy AI
description: Implement the designed algorithm using a suitable programming language and framework.

title: Develop Frontend for User Interface
description: Implement the designed user interface using a suitable frontend framework.

title: Integrate Backend and Frontend
description: Connect the backend with the frontend, ensuring seamless communication between components.
dependencies: Develop Backend for Music Therapy AI

title: Implement Database and Data Model
description: Design, develop, and set up the database schema to store user data and music files.

title: Test MusicTherapyAssistant
description: Perform functional and non-functional testing to ensure the application works as intended and meets all requirements.
dependencies: Develop Backend for Music Therapy AI

title: Deploy MusicTherapyAssistant
description: Package, test, and deploy the application to a suitable production environment.

title: Conduct Post-Deployment Review
description: Review the performance of the deployed application, identify any issues or areas for improvement, and make necessary adjustments.
